channel.title: ngoctd on Dev's Log
channel.description: Recent content in ngoctd on Dev's Log

item.title: Automatic connect to VPN
item.description: The OpenVPN is an open source Virtual Private Network (VPN) project. It creates secure connections over the Internet using a custom security protocol that utilizes SSL/TLS. In this article, i will introduce naive solution for automatic connect to VPN using openvpn and systemd management.

item.title: Channel in Golang
item.description: Channel is an important built-in feature in Go. It is one of the features makes Go unique. Channel makes concurrent programming convenient, fun and lowers the difficulties of concurrent programming. Channel mainly acts as a concurrency synchronization technique. To understand channels better, the internal structure of channels and some implementation details by the standard Go compiler/runtime are also simply described.

item.title: Tổng hợp ví dụ về channel trong golang
